scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn run clean && yarn run build
scripts.depchart-main: depchart `find src | grep .ts` --exclude `find src | grep '/test/'` `find src | grep '/types/'` src/_old.ts src/util/utils.ts src/util/log.ts src/util/errors.ts --rankdir LR -o depchart/depchart --node_modules omit
scripts.depchart-types: depchart `find src | grep '/types/' | grep .ts` --rankdir LR -o depchart/depchart-types --node_modules omit
scripts.depchart-most: depchart `find src | grep .ts` --exclude `find src | grep '/test/'` src/types/docTypes.ts src/util/log.ts src/util/errors.ts src/util/utils.ts --rankdir LR -o depchart/depchart-most --node_modules omit
scripts.depchart: yarn run depchart-main && yarn run depchart-types && yarn run depchart-most
